H0.text: How many times does the second-hand of an clockwork clock 'tick' (move) while the hour-hand completes one full rotation. 3600

H1.text: How many times does the second-hand of an clockwork clock 'tick' (move) while the hour-hand completes one full rotation. 86400

H2.text: How many times does the second-hand of an clockwork clock 'tick' (move) while the hour-hand completes one full rotation. 2880

H3.text: How many times does the second-hand of an clockwork clock 'tick' (move) while the hour-hand completes one full rotation. 43200

A6.text: The hour hand of an analog clock completes one full rotation every 12 hours, and the second hand moves once per second. In 12 hours, there are 12 * 60 * 60 = 43200 seconds.
